headline: Boston Beer (SAM) Surpasses Q2 Earnings Estimates
summary: Boston Beer (SAM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +24.71% and -1.48%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: Boston Beer (SAM) Surpasses Q2 Earnings Estimates
raw.summary: Boston Beer (SAM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +24.71% and -1.48%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell TAP and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Molson Coors’s shares (currently trading at $52.08) have posted a disappointing 5.6% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 4.3% gain. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
